name: centennial
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(the day or year that is) 100 years after an important event: centennial celebrations Next year is the centennial of her death. See also
bicentennial

Add to word list
Add to word list
the day or year that is 100 years after a particular event, esp. an important one; the 100th anniversary: The sculpture commemorates Wyoming’s centennial.
